subject: Urgent: Verify your account
body: Your account has been locked. Click https://example.com/verify to unlock it.

subject: Meeting reminder
body: Reminder: Project meeting tomorrow at 10 AM in the main conference room.

subject: You won a prize!
body: Congratulations! Claim your prize now: http://claim-prize.example.com

subject: Project update
body: The project deliverables are updated in the shared drive. Please review.

subject: Bank alert
body: We detected suspicious activity on your account. Login immediately at http://bank.example.verify.com

subject: Team lunch today
body: Who's up for lunch at 1 PM today?

subject: Password reset required
body: Your password has expired. Reset here: https://secure-reset.example.com

subject: Weekly newsletter
body: Here’s the weekly newsletter with updates from our company.

subject: Confirm your subscription
body: Click here to confirm your newsletter subscription: http://spam-link.example.com

subject: Vacation request approved
body: Your vacation request for next week has been approved.

subject: Invoice overdue
body: Your invoice #12345 is overdue. Pay now: http://fake-invoice.example.com

subject: Birthday celebration
body: Join us in the cafeteria to celebrate Sarah's birthday.

subject: Security notice
body: Suspicious login detected. Confirm your identity: http://fake-login.example.com

subject: Meeting agenda
body: Attached is the agenda for tomorrow’s team meeting.

subject: Congratulations!
body: You have been selected for a gift card. Claim here: http://scam.example.com

subject: Report submission
body: Please submit your monthly report by Friday.

subject: Account verification required
body: Verify your identity immediately: http://phishing-link.example.com

subject: Weekly update
body: Here’s the weekly update from the team.

subject: Lottery winner!
body: You won a lottery! Click here to claim: http://fraud.example.com

subject: Office party
body: Office party this Friday at 6 PM in the lounge. Everyone is invited!
